description: UniFi Poller v2.0 Displays DPI information for clients in a UniFi network using InfluxDB.

options.content: This dashboard is very new and may contain errors. Please help me make it better. If you spot things that are inaccurate, [please report](https://github.com/unifi-poller/dashboards/issues/new) them!

panels.description: This shows lifetime rx+tx total and totals accumulated during the selected time range. The filters at the top of this page control _all_ of the graphs, and in some cases control the visibility of graphs. ie. Adding more clients displays more graphs under the collapsed Clients rows.

targets.query: SELECT last("rx_bytes") AS "Bytes Rx Total", last("tx_bytes") AS "Bytes Tx Total" FROM "clientdpi" WHERE ("site_name" =~ /^$Site$/ AND "name" = 'TOTAL' AND "category" =~ /^$Category$/ AND "application" = 'TOTAL' AND "mac" = 'TOTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "site_name", "category", "source", "application", "name", "mac"

panels.title: Totals  by Category

panels.description:
Showing traffic by app.
This updates with the variables on the dashboard.
This is grand totals and does not respect the time range, sorry. :(

targets.query: SELECT last("rx_bytes")+last("tx_bytes") FROM "clientdpi" WHERE ("category" =~ /^$Category$/ AND "source" =~ /^$Controller$/ AND "site_name" =~ /^$Site$/ AND "name" =~ /^$Client$/ AND "application" != 'TOTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application", "category"

panels.title: Total Traffic by Application

panels.description:
Showing traffic by cat.
This updates with the variables on the dashboard.
This is grand totals and does not respect the time range, sorry. :(

targets.query: SELECT last("rx_bytes")+last("tx_bytes") FROM "clientdpi" WHERE ("category" =~ /^$Category$/ AND "source" =~ /^$Controller$/ AND "site_name" =~ /^$Site$/ AND "name" =~ /^$Client$/ AND "application" = 'TOTAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "application", "category"

panels.title: Total Traffic by Category

panels.description: Bytes Transferred by Category. Receive is on the negative axis.
panels.title: Bytes Transferred per Category

panels.description: Packets Transferred by Category. Receive is on the negative axis.
panels.title: Packets Transferred  per Category

list.definition: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="source"
list.name: Controller
list.query: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="source"

list.definition: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="site_name" WHERE source =~ /^$Controller$/
list.name: Site
list.query: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="site_name" WHERE source =~ /^$Controller$/

list.definition: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="name" WHERE source =~ /^$Controller$/ AND site_name =~ /^$Site$/
list.name: Client
list.query: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="name" WHERE source =~ /^$Controller$/ AND site_name =~ /^$Site$/

list.definition: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="category" WHERE source =~ /^$Controller$/ AND site_name =~ /^$Site$/
list.name: Category
list.query: show tag values from "clientdpi" with key="category" WHERE source =~ /^$Controller$/ AND site_name =~ /^$Site$/

title: UniFi-Poller: Client DPI - InfluxDB
